doc:
Steve Barclay (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_Barclay_(actor) 0 Steve Barclay or Stephen Barclay (1918–1994) was an American film actor known for his work in Italy. He was married to the actress Lyla Rocco. Steve_Barclay or Stephen_Barclay ( 1918 – 1994 ) was an_American_film_actor known for his_work in Italy . He was_married to the_actress_Lyla_Rocco .
